title: The Mackenzie file
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Education, Higher - Great Britain
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Education - Study and teaching
description: Episode of Series "Curriculum Design and Development". One of a series of a second level course from the Faculty of Educational Studies, Open University. A wide range of ideas and practices in education is examined with a view to discovering consistencies and inconsistencies. This is followed by a review of the principles involved in curriculum development. Ends with a survey of the various constraints on curriculum development and the forces which generate change.
